headline: Bill Patterson and Walt Disney
description: A poetic contrast between two icons of imagination—one retreating from empire, the other building one. Lives in Contradiction at its most American.
timeFelt: Wistful friction—purity of vision vs. engineered myth.
resonantThread: What price do we pay for influence? What is lost when we win?
whyItMatters: This piece touches a core dilemma—what it means to protect a soul’s work from its own success, or lean into the mythmaking machine and reshape a world.
